newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: RUGBY UNION-SOUTH AFRICAN CURRIE CUP RESULTS.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-SOUTH AFRICAN CURRIE CUP RESULTS.

text.p: Results from the 11th round of the Currie Cup:
Griqualand West beat Northern Free State 78-10 (halftime 31-10)
Griqualand West - Tries: Abrie Pretorius, Andre Cloete, Leon van der Wath (2), Ian Horn (2), Theo Oosthuizen (2), Edrich Lubbe (2), Franco Smith, Dawie Theron (80 min). Conversions: Franco Smith (9).
Northern Free State: Try: Willie Nagel. Conversion: Eric Herbert. Penalty: Herbert.
South-Eastern Transvaal - Tries: Oorlog Oosthuizen, Polla Nel. Penalties: Clive Terreblanche (4).
Boland - Tries: Stefan Terreblanche, Johan Swanepoel. Penalties: Francois Horn (3).
Eastern Province - Tries: Cecil du Plessis, Andries Fourie. Conversions: Andries Fourie (2) Penalties: Bertus Kruger (2)
Transvaal - Tries: Pieter Hendriks, Hennie le Roux Conversions: Gavin Lawless (2) Penalties: Lawless (2) Drop Goal: Le Roux.
Western Transvaal - Tries: Rudi Muller, Andre Coetzer. Conversions: Johan Mostert (2). Penalties: Mostert (4).
Border - Tries: Russell Bennett (2), Andre Claassen. Conversions: Greg Miller (3). Penalties: Miller (4).
Northern Transvaal - Tries: Joost van der Westhuizen (2), Hafn In George: Eastern Transvaal beat South Western Dicts
South Western Districts - Tries: Nico Heunif, Paul Treu. Conversions: Juri Coetzee (2). Penalties: Coetzee (2).
Eastern Transvaal - Tries: Eugene Meyer, I.P.van der Merwe, Jaco Viljoen, Hennie Pieterse. Conversion: Jaco Viljoen. Penalties: Viljoen (3).
